relation: Light diffusing thermoplastic tube to encircle an elongated lighting element
Receptacle closure comprising a resilient spacer
Holder for sample containers of different sizes
Package for sterile and contamination-free storage of artificial implants
pageTitle: Patent US5316146 - Vial transporter - Google Patents
textBeforeTable: Patent Citations While particular embodiments have been described, it is to be understood that these embodiments are not to be construed as limiting the scope of the present invention, as other modifications are possible. The scope of the present invention is therefore to be construed in accordance with the appended claims. In use, a vial containing body fluid to be transported is inserted into the base of the vial transporter. The cap is then placed over the transporter body, urged downwardly and rotated, forming a liquid-tight seal between the cap and base of the transporter by virtue of the bayonet joint and the tapered wall sections of the cap and base. With the cap locked on to the body, the spring restrains axially upward movement of the vial and also prevents dislodging of the plug closure from the vial. At the same time, the spring urges and maintains the vial in a seated position within the vanes in the base, thus providing yieldable axial and radial positioning. When the vial is subjected to an external force or subjected to sharp impacts, for example if the transporter or package containing the transporter is dropped, or if other articles are suddenly dropped on top of the transporter, the impacts are absorbed by the transporter walls and by resilient supports in all possible directions of vial movement. The transport container of the present invention is particularly useful for transporting vials, such
